items.sentence: I didn\'t go out at all because you told me not to.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary could be so stupid.
Tom doesn\'t gain weight even though he eats a lot.
Tom snored so loudly I could hear him from my room.
Tom sold his car to Mary for three hundred dollars.
Tom sold the necklace to Mary for a very low price.
Tom speaks three languages, one of which is French.
How did you ever get Tom to give you that painting?
How did you know that Tom had never been to Boston?
Tom asked Mary not to discuss the matter with John.
Tom asked Mary to find out how to apply for a visa.
I didn\'t know that Tom could speak French so well.
I didn\'t know that Tom was still living in Boston.
I didn\'t know we were supposed to be here by 2:30.
I didn\'t know what had happened until Tom told me.
I didn\'t know you wanted to go to Boston with Tom.
Would it be possible for me to get a cup of coffee?
Tom noticed that Mary\'s car wasn\'t in the garage.
Tom certainly doesn\'t look like he\'s over eighty.
Tom didn\'t have the right equipment to do the job.
